name: Chicken Arroz Caldo (Chicken Rice Porridge)
author: lola
summary: This is a soupy dish that is served mainly for a snack.
ingredients: 1 (2 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
2 ¼ pounds chicken wings, split and tips discarded
1 teaspoon fish sauce for sprinkling, if desired  (Optional)
directions: Heat the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat; cook and stir the onion, garlic, and ginger in the hot oil until fragrant, about 5 minutes
Add the chicken wings; cook and stir together for 1 minute
Stir the fish sauce into the pot, cover, and cook another 2 minutes
Pour the chicken broth into the pot
Add the sweet rice and stir
Bring the mixture to a boil; cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally to assure the rice is not sticking to the bottom of the pot
Garnish with the green onion, and serve with lemon slices and additional fish sauce, if desired
